-About Us-
"Falconium is a gaming brand and E-Sports foundation founded in late '24.
we are dedicated to gaming and making it easy and accessible to everyone, and that is why our laptops and peripherals are all competitively priced. our E-Sports team is well-renowned in the world of Counter-Ops and Call of Justice, and our team are the finalists in the katowice '25 major. Falconium is looking for skilled players who want to make their mark in the world of E-Sports. Applications are always open. Note that if you have been rejected or turned down for any reason, you may not apply for two months, and after that you may be reconsidered."
We are authorized manufacturers of high-quality gaming peripherals, laptops, chairs. We deal have authorized resellers distributed across the country, with an aim to expand globally.
We think that gaming is more than just a casual pass-time ; it has the capacity to be a full-blown career pathway, and that is why not only are we passionate about creating gaming products,
we also take on gamers as talent, to compete for gold globally. Your skill and the content of your character matter here at falconium, over all else.
